mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (name, no, gender, phone, degree, clazz_id, id_card, is_college, address, graduation_date) VALUES (#{name},#{no},#{gender},#{phone},#{degree},#{clazzId},#{idCard},#{isCollege},#{address},#{graduationDate});
mapper.delete:
DELETE from student where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.no, s.gender, s.phone, s.degree, s.id_card, s.is_college, s.address, s.graduation_date, s.violation_count, s.violation_score, s.clazz_id, s.create_time, s.update_time, c.name AS clazzName FROM student s LEFT JOIN clazz c ON s.clazz_id = c.id ORDER BY s.create_time DESC

select case when degree = 1 then '初中' when degree = 2 then '高中' when degree = 3 then '大专' when degree = 4 then '本科' when degree = 5 then '硕士' else '其他' end as name, count(*) as value from student group by degree

select case when clazz_id = 1 then 'JavaEE就业163期' when clazz_id = 2 then '前端就业90期' when clazz_id = 3 then 'JavaEE就业165期' when clazz_id = 4 then 'JavaEE就业166期' when clazz_id = 5 then '大数据就业58期' when clazz_id = 6 then 'JavaEE就业167期' else '其他班级' end as name, count(*) as value from student group by clazz_id order by clazz_id
